admin.payment.paypal.additionalData.desc:
Sign up now to active at your store: click here

  • Accept credit cards VISA, MASTER, HIPERCARD, ELO.
  • Fee: check the conditions directly with Paypal. Rate may vary according to the profile of each seller.
  • To view the commercial installment terms, click here
admin.payment.paypal.minimumValue.descri: Minimum amount to display this form of payment
admin.payment.paypal.installments.number: Number of interest-free installments for this form of payment.
